name: phonebook-app-backend
description: This repository has the exercises for the part 3 "Node.js and Express" of the Full Stack Open 2020 Course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../FSO2020-Phonebook-app-front && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../FSO2020-Phonebook-app-back/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
